light_questions.word: What's your favorite subject in school?
What's your favorite type of music?
What's your favorite ice cream flavor?
What's your favorite day of the week?
What's your favorite thing to do on weekends?

moderate_questions.word: What would you do with a million dollars?
If you could travel anywhere, where would you go?
What's your biggest fear?
What's your greatest accomplishment?
What's something you've always wanted to learn?
If you could meet anyone, who would it be?
What's your dream job?
What's the best advice you've ever received?
What's something you're really good at?
What's your biggest pet peeve?
If you could have any superpower, what would it be?
What's the most interesting place you've visited?
What's something you can't live without?
What's your favorite family tradition?
What's the best gift you've ever received?
What's something that always makes you laugh?
What's your favorite way to relax?
What's something you're passionate about?
What's the most challenging thing you've overcome?
What's something you're looking forward to?

in_depth_questions.word: What's the most important lesson life has taught you?
How do you define success?
What's something you wish you could change about the world?
What's your biggest regret?
What motivates you to keep going when things get tough?
What's something you believe strongly in?
How has failure shaped who you are today?
What's the most difficult decision you've ever made?
What do you want your legacy to be?
What's something you've learned about yourself recently?
How do you handle stress and pressure?
What's something you're still trying to figure out?
What's the most valuable relationship in your life?
What's something you're grateful for today?
How have your priorities changed over time?
What's something you wish people understood about you?
What's the best decision you've ever made?
What's something that challenges your beliefs?
How do you want to grow as a person?
What's something you hope never changes about you?
